00046 template<class T>
00047 void parseEmfObject(const std::string& objectSerialized, T*& object_ptr, const std::string msgComp=std::string()) {
00048 
00049   object_ptr = NULL;
00050   try {
00051     //CREATE DATA MODEL
00052     T tmpObject;
00053     ecore::EPackage_ptr ecorePackage = tmpObject._eClass()->getEPackage();
00054     ecorecpp::MetaModelRepository::_instance()->load(ecorePackage);
00055 
00056     //Parse the model
00057     ecorecpp::parser::parser parser;
00058     object_ptr = parser.load_str(objectSerialized)->as< T >();
00059   }
00060   catch (std::exception& e) {
00061     throw SystemException(ERRCODE_INVDATA, msgComp);
00062   }
00063 
00064 }
